verses.verse: (A Song. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. For the choir director; according to) (Mahalath Leannoth. A Maskil of Heman the Ezrahite.) O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> I have <S%H6817>cried<s%> out by <S%H3117>day<s%> and in the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> Thee.
Let my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee; <S%H5186>Incline<s%> Thine <S%H241>ear<s%> to my <S%H7440>cry!<s%>
For my <S%H5315>soul<s%> has <S%H7646>had<s%> <S%H7646>enough<s%> <S%H9567>troubles,<s%> And my <S%H9132>life<s%> has <S%H5060>drawn<s%> <S%H5060>near<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>

I am <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit;<s%> I <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> like a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H353>strength,<s%>

<S%H2670>Forsaken<s%> among the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H3644>Like<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> who <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave,<s%> <S%H834>Whom<s%> Thou dost <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more,<s%> And they are <S%H1504>cut<s%> <S%H1504>off<s%> from Thy <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H7896>put<s%> me in the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H953>pit,<s%> In <S%H4285>dark<s%> <S%H4285>places,<s%> in the <S%H4688>depths.<s%>
Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> has <S%H5564>rested<s%> upon me, And Thou hast <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me with <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H4867>waves.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H7368>removed<s%> my <S%H3045>acquaintances<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from me; Thou hast <S%H7896>made<s%> me an <S%H8441>object<s%> of <S%H8441>loathing<s%> to them; I am <S%H3607>shut<s%> up and <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out.

My <S%H5869>eye<s%> has <S%H1669>wasted<s%> <S%H1669>away<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction;<s%> I have <S%H7121>called<s%> upon Thee <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> I have <S%H7849>spread<s%> out my <S%H3709>hands<s%> to Thee.

Wilt Thou <S%H6213>perform<s%> <S%H6382>wonders<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>? Will the <S%H7496>departed<s%> <S%H7496>spirits<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> [and] <S%H3034>praise<s%> Thee? <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Will Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> be <S%H5608>declared<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave,<s%> Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> in <S%H11>Abaddon<s%>?
Will Thy <S%H6382>wonders<s%> be <S%H3045>made<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>? And Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5388>forgetfulness<s%>?
But I, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H7768>cried<s%> out to Thee for <S%H7768>help,<s%> And in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H6923>comes<s%> <S%H6923>before<s%> Thee.
O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> dost Thou <S%H2186>reject<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? [Why] dost Thou <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from me?
I was <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and about to <S%H1478>die<s%> from my <S%H5290>youth<s%> on; I <S%H5375>suffer<s%> Thy <S%H367>terrors;<s%> I am <S%H9023>overcome.<s%>
Thy <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H2740>anger<s%> has <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me; Thy <S%H1161>terrors<s%> have <S%H6789>destroyed<s%> me.
They have <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me like <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long; They have <S%H5362>encompassed<s%> me <S%H3162>altogether.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H7368>removed<s%> <S%H157>lover<s%> and <S%H7453>friend<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from me; My <S%H3045>acquaintances<s%> are [in] <S%H4285>darkness.<s%>
